title: Man's death in Markham truck crash ruled homicide
text:
The death of a 38-year-old pedestrian who was hit by a truck in south suburban Markham Friday has been ruled a homicide, officials said Saturday.
Hector Villanueva, of the 3100 block of West 147th Street in Posen, suffered multiple injuries after being hit by a truck Friday at 15205 Sacramento Ave. in Markham, according to the Cook County medical examinerâ€™s office.
Jones died at 6:42 a.m. Friday, and an autopsy Saturday ruled his death a homicide, authorities said.
Markham police denied requests for comment Saturday.
